dict.string:
if [[ -z "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" ]]; then echo "Nothing is selected." exit fi
url=$(curl 2>/dev/null http://paste.textmate.org/submit -F user="$USER" -F text="$(expand -t $TM_TAB_SIZE)")
if [[ -n "$url" ]]; then osascript -e 'tell application "Colloquy" to send message "pasted '"$url"'" action tense yes to (get chat room "##textmate" of (first connection where server address is equal to "irc.freenode.net"))' else echo "Got no URL back from pasting service." fi
